Grocer Vollodos: The problem is not that all try to escape to a safe place, such as Talking Island. They say many people can't find a place to escape and died from a strange disease. In this area there are also a lot of accidents. Deaths will be more and more if we do not will take anything. Survivors must help others. Could you help me?
